\M{4}The following two tables are used when disassembling \.{MIX} code.
Let \PB{\|C} be the operation code read from the input program,
\PB{\|F} be the field specification and \PB{\|I} be the index of \PB{\\{mix%
\_optab}} entry,
describing the instruction in question.
Then, \PB{$\|I\K\\{dd\_ent}[\|C]$}, if \PB{$\\{dd\_cnt}[\|C]\E\T{1}$}.
Otherwise, if \PB{$\|F<\\{dd\_cnt}[\|C]$},
\PB{$\|I\K\\{dd\_ent}[\|C]+\|F$}.

\fi
